items.content_html: A lightweight RAG for embedding and querying codebases. This service allows users to download GitHub repositories, process their code, store it in a vector database, and query it using natural language to retrieve relevant code snippets. Perfect for building intelligent code search and analysis tools.
items.title: hashir-ayaz/codebase-rag: A lightweight RAG for embedding and querying codebases. This service allows users to download GitHub repositories, process their code, store it in a vector database, and query it using natural language to retrieve relevant code snippets. Perfect for building intelligent code search and analysis tools.

items.content_html: A lightweight Point of Sale (POS) system built with React, TypeScript, and TailwindCSS. This system allows you to manage customers and items without the need for a backend server. It is entirely in-memory, making it ideal for small-scale usage or testing.
items.title: yasith-chathuranga/react-in-memory-pos: A lightweight Point of Sale (POS) system built with React, TypeScript, and TailwindCSS. This system allows you to manage customers and items without the need for a backend server. It is entirely in-memory, making it ideal for small-scale usage or testing.
